Package ch.tichuana.tichu.client.controller

Class PlayController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.tichuana.tichu.client.controller.PlayController
  • class PlayController
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private ClientModel clientModel  
      private GameView gameView  
      private static int INIT_HANDSIZE  
      private static int MAX_HANDSIZE  
      private static java.util.ArrayList<Card> oldMove  
      private int passCounter  
      private java.util.ArrayList<Card> receivedCards  
      private javafx.stage.Stage stage  
      private Translator translator  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      PlayController​(ClientModel clientModel, GameView gameView, javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      attaches listener to the stage-width to make the CardArea responsive, updates TextField (console) on incoming Messages from the server, handling all messagesTypes depending on the int code which is set in the clientModel sets Buttons on action, to send Messages to server when being clicked, makes the cardArea listen to mouse event for auto-validation of the selection, sets the Language menu on action, disconnects client from server when the windows is closed general information: local variables are used as often as possible to avoid ugly getter chains

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private void activateHand​(javafx.beans.Observable obs)
      updating the CardsLabels when something changes in the Hand from the ClientModel and making cards clickable
      private void autoValidateMove​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      if cards are selected the play button changes to play and if not it changes to pass if the combination is valid according to the last move, the selected cards change their border color to green, if not, they change their border color to red
      void changeTranslator​(javafx.event.Event event)
      initialize new a translator object for language change.
      private java.util.ArrayList<CardLabel> getSelectedCardLabels()
      returns the current selection of the cardLabel objects
      private java.util.ArrayList<Card> getSelectedCards()
      Important: not similar to the following method.
      private java.lang.String getTriggeringPlayer()
      simple service method to avoid repeating ugly calls in the upper service methods
      private void handleAnnouncedTichuMsg()
      mainly altering the GUI depending on this player announced or not.
      private void handleFirstDealMsg()
      the cards receiving in the first DealMsg have already been set by the ClientModel!
      private void handleGameDoneMsg()
      updates the points column in the view with the new scores, makes sure no inputs is possible and then wait 5 seconds for UX reasons: user has the chance to see why the Game/Match is done
      private void handleGameStartedMsg()
      sets the playerNames of the teamMate and the opponents
      private void handleSchupfenMsg​(boolean finished)
      decides whether all clients are done with pushing and the saved cards can be handed out, or if not and the cards only need to be saved
      private void handleSecondDealMsg()
      the cards receiving in the second DealMsg have already been set by the ClientModel!
      private void handleUpdateMsg()
      the first if/else block decides whether the last player played or passed depending on that the view will be updated and the pass counter will be updated the second if/else block decides whether its this player's turn or not and updates the GUI accordingly
      private void makeCardsClickable()
      sets all cardLabels in the CardArea on action and toggles its isSelected variable accordingly

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlayController

        PlayController​(ClientModel clientModel,
               GameView gameView,
               javafx.stage.Stage stage)
        attaches listener to the stage-width to make the CardArea responsive, updates TextField (console) on incoming Messages from the server, handling all messagesTypes depending on the int code which is set in the clientModel sets Buttons on action, to send Messages to server when being clicked, makes the cardArea listen to mouse event for auto-validation of the selection, sets the Language menu on action, disconnects client from server when the windows is closed general information: local variables are used as often as possible to avoid ugly getter chains
        Parameters:
        clientModel - following MVC pattern
        gameView - following MVC pattern
        stage - following MVC pattern

    • Method Detail

      • activateHand

        private void activateHand​(javafx.beans.Observable obs)
        updating the CardsLabels when something changes in the Hand from the ClientModel and making cards clickable
        Parameters:
        obs - unused but necessary observable value from the listener

      • autoValidateMove

        private void autoValidateMove​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
        if cards are selected the play button changes to play and if not it changes to pass if the combination is valid according to the last move, the selected cards change their border color to green, if not, they change their border color to red
        Parameters:
        mouseEvent - handling mouse click in CardArea

      • changeTranslator

        public void changeTranslator​(javafx.event.Event event)
        initialize new a translator object for language change.
        Parameters:
        event - click event on menuItem

      • getSelectedCardLabels

        private java.util.ArrayList<CardLabel> getSelectedCardLabels()
        returns the current selection of the cardLabel objects
        Returns:
        the currently selected cardLabels

      • getSelectedCards

        private java.util.ArrayList<Card> getSelectedCards()
        Important: not similar to the following method. This method returns the current selection based on the card objects
        Returns:
        the currently selected cards

      • getTriggeringPlayer

        private java.lang.String getTriggeringPlayer()
        simple service method to avoid repeating ugly calls in the upper service methods
        Returns:
        returns the playerName of the current message

      • handleAnnouncedTichuMsg

        private void handleAnnouncedTichuMsg()
        mainly altering the GUI depending on this player announced or not. changes the instance variable "GrandTichu" in the clientModel if necessary

      • handleFirstDealMsg

        private void handleFirstDealMsg()
        the cards receiving in the first DealMsg have already been set by the ClientModel! resetting some important variable which have been set in the previous Match and activating the the hand to automatically alter the GUI if cards are played or received altering GUI to make it possible for the user to announce GrandTichu or pass

      • handleGameDoneMsg

        private void handleGameDoneMsg()
        updates the points column in the view with the new scores, makes sure no inputs is possible and then wait 5 seconds for UX reasons: user has the chance to see why the Game/Match is done

      • handleGameStartedMsg

        private void handleGameStartedMsg()
        sets the playerNames of the teamMate and the opponents

      • handleSchupfenMsg

        private void handleSchupfenMsg​(boolean finished)
        decides whether all clients are done with pushing and the saved cards can be handed out, or if not and the cards only need to be saved
        Parameters:
        finished - indicates, if process of pushing is done

      • handleSecondDealMsg

        private void handleSecondDealMsg()
        the cards receiving in the second DealMsg have already been set by the ClientModel! initializes the handColumn to prevent ugly resizing in the playArea while playing cards attention: MAX_HANDSIZE is important for the handColumn in the PlayArea decides whether the use did not announced GrandTichu and is now able to announce SmallTichu or announced GrandTichu and needs to wait until all players made their announcements

      • handleUpdateMsg

        private void handleUpdateMsg()
        the first if/else block decides whether the last player played or passed depending on that the view will be updated and the pass counter will be updated the second if/else block decides whether its this player's turn or not and updates the GUI accordingly

      • makeCardsClickable

        private void makeCardsClickable()
        sets all cardLabels in the CardArea on action and toggles its isSelected variable accordingly
